data.name: Quora - No SignUp Nagging
Tumblr - Black Theme
data.description: I painstakingly went through every menu I could find on this hellsite to make sure there was nothing left of the original color. It also has some additional coding to work with some New-XKit addons! If I did happen to miss anything… please do not hesitate to let me know at my tumblr.

user.name: outsiders-void
user.about: Please send an ask to my tumblr page if there are any problems with any of my styles or if you would like me to change/add anything to them. I'm more likely to see it there than I am here.

data.name: Better Youtube - Dark Mode
data.description: This stylish adds a blue modern design with round edges and blur to youtube. I hope you like my stylish! Highlights: - Rounded edges - Blurred Backgrounds - Fade-In Animations - Socialblade Support Note: This stylish was made for Youtubes Dark Mode so please enable Youtubes Dark Mode. Note 2: If you don't see blurred backgrounds, you may need to enable them in your browser-preference. Otherwise your browser doesn't support blurred backgrounds. More Info If you have feedback or found some bugs let me hear it in the comments!
